website_summaries.verdict: Spending Christmas Eve with the Dark Knight is not the exhilarating experience you might expect in Batman: Arkham Origins, a largely and tiring tedious retread on what used to be unique and energizing ideas.
pros: Challenge, multiplayer modes nicely extend experience

customer_reviews.title: This is a great game. It follows the same basic formula as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game. It follows the same basic formula as other Arkham games, and that is great. Also, big points for giving some real time and substance to some of the more obscure villains. Voice acting and music are also amazing. I would really recommend this game if you have enjoyed other Arkham games.
customer_reviews.author: B. Tyerman

customer_reviews.title: Actually my favourite of the series so far
customer_reviews.text: Actually my favourite of the series so far. It certainly has a different feel to the game with Warner Bros developing it in-house rather than the original developers (Rocksteady Studios) however, it is a brilliant game and definitely a must have for fans.
customer_reviews.author: StefanD

customer_reviews.title: Wii U version.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present, although I have the Wii U version myself!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Story is great, but a lot of bugs
customer_reviews.text: Story was not what i was expecting but it was still great. The Problem was the huge amount of Bugs. I skipped for example a Boss fight. But after all this Bugs are hopefully taking care of this game will be worth 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jojangamer13

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game wish i could explore the whole of gotham
customer_reviews.author: kai china

customer_reviews.title: more of the same
customer_reviews.text: Played the last two like the character design think they really well executed and gives them justice to say this is a franchise game, combat is ok its more about timing and patience rather than just button bashing. you fly around the city again but it is probably linear than arkham city tbh.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. Mangham

customer_reviews.title: It was good Game but
customer_reviews.text: It was good Game but, it could have been better for certain reasons. 1. At times viruses occurred. 2. The Cold Cold Heart & Game Plus part were not accessible after completing the story mode for some reason. 3. It would have been more interesting to solve actual riddles and save hostages held by The Riddler than collect random data packs.
customer_reviews.author: Theo Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good game, nice combat, cheesy but enjoyable villains, city just needs abit more 'depth' though.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Very similar to its prequels but seems to be lacking something.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after playing its prequels, and while it continues in much the same vain (not sure if anything is different at all?), it does not seem to have the same addictive quality that the others did. Getting used to the controls was a little difficult too, I need to play more of it to give a better review, but to be frank the fact that I haven't may well send a message that no review would be able to,
customer_reviews.author: captaindyson

customer_reviews.title: Im Batman
customer_reviews.text: Flipping brilliant game Bootyful graphics Amazing Story Awesome free roam Wickedsick skins And its batman Dowside? Multiplayer hardly works

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good game its a steam install so no understanding why it requires 3 disks.
customer_reviews.author: ross dougan

customer_reviews.title: A poor sequel to Arkham City
customer_reviews.text: I've found this game to be buggy with one of the big problems of kicking you from the single player if you're internet connection goes out mid game. The single player lacks the charm of the previous titles. The multiplayer is decent but the match making is pretty terrible and takes about 10-15mins between games. If you love the prequels give it a go but don't expect to much.
customer_reviews.author: Odhran Molloy

customer_reviews.title: Game OK but no Bonus for PC Pre-Order
customer_reviews.text: Pre-ordered this on Amazon for PC as the picture shows a PC-DVD box which says that pre-order would get bonus character. Game arrived but with no bonus - when I contacted Amazon they said the promotion did not apply to all platforms !
customer_reviews.author: keeperofthekiwi

customer_reviews.title: A good prequel
customer_reviews.text: Rocksteady left some big shoes to fill after making Arkham City but Splash Damage just about managed it. Definitely buy this if you love the Arkham series.
customer_reviews.author: Deano

The answer is for steam to allow the keys to load the game - They can do that easily even if they say they can't Again their usage doesn't discriminate between can't and won't . Hey you Yanks Russia isn't in the EU by the way !!

customer_reviews.title: As welcome as a fart in a spacesuit

customer_reviews.title: Can't Redeem the Product code
customer_reviews.text: Much like every other person in this section, I have received the "not available in this country" error. To which I have applied for a complete refund, I'll get it elsewhere when it comes down in price. I was unhappy that the game was delayed by 2 weeks for no adequate reason and I am further disappointed by how the game turned out when it finally got released.
customer_reviews.author: Some Dude

customer_reviews.title: What a cock up
customer_reviews.text: BEH :( I'm having the same issues as everyone else, I contacted Amazon who have sent me another copy of the game but I doubt that will change the situation. I can't believe the game was delayed for two weeks and then still has these issues once it's finally released. Disappointed to say the least :( My one star review is for the issues we're all having not the game itself hopefully that will be better
customer_reviews.author: M. Row

customer_reviews.title: I cannot even rate it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a rather sorry situation for all parties: Amazon, Steam and WB games. Like everyone else, I ordered a game that does not work as it does not recognize the game as a European region product even thought it clearly states at the back of the box it is a product made in the EU. Please sort this out out as it is a very unprofessional practice to send out products that does not work to paying customers at the get go!

customer_reviews.title: Cant dowload in the U.K
customer_reviews.text: My first complaint is that this has arrived on the 8th Nov when its realease date was Oct 25th. The second reason i have rated this so low is that when i enter the steam key it says it is not avalable in the UK and my installation simply closes. I am very dissapointed as this was something I was looking forward to. Hopefully this gets fixed in a day or two.

customer_reviews.title: Game not available in your country.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game a week before the game came out for PC on Amazon. Was really looking forward to it as I was a great fan of the Arkham series. When it arrived on the 8th November I inserted the disk and it asked me to put in the product key. So I did. Then steam told me I couldn't use this in my country (UK). I was very dissapointed hopefully this will be made ok but until then, huge letdown.

product_meta.title: Batman: Arkham Origins (PC DVD)
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC| Edition:Standard Edition

Batman: Arkham Origins features an expanded Gotham City and introduces an original prequel storyline set several years before the events of Batman: Arkham Asylum and Batman: Arkham City, the first two critically acclaimed games of the franchise.

Taking place before the rise of Gotham City’s most dangerous criminals, the game showcases a young and unrefined Batman as he faces a defining moment in his early career as a crime fighter that sets his path to becoming the Dark Knight. As the story unfolds, players will meet many important characters for the first time and forge key relationships.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
